methods.name: renderMainButton
methods.description: Returns the HTML for the main button.

as.description: Customizes the appearance, can be set to 'primary', 'secondary' or 'transparent'.

text.description: The text to be displayed in the SplitButton.

disabled.description: Gives the button a disabled state.

data-element.description: A custom value for the data-element attribute

data-role.description: A custom value for the data-element attribute

align.description: Aligns the button's options, can be set to `right`.
